vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
χρῡσο-δακτύλιος [ῠ], ον,
with ring of gold, ἀνήρ [NT]
__2 gloss on{χρυσοκόλλητος}, χ. σφραγίς set in a gold ring, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: having or wearing a gold ring -ringed
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
having or wearing a gold ring -ringed
having rings of gold on the fingers, Jas. 2:2*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: que lleva un anillo de oro
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 有金戒指的, 以金戒指為妝裝飾 (雅 2:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 有金戒指的, 以金戒指为妆装饰 (雅 2:2)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: có nhẫn vàng; đeo nhẫn vàng.
vocabInfos._es_Gloss: que lleva un anillo de oro
